Credits
****************************

Most figures in this documentation were created using the `blender
<https://www.blender.org/>`_ 3D software.

The 3D camera models used in the figures were taken from Turbosquid and created by Hugosworld.
   
The calibration checkboard and ruler were designed by `MÃ«kanic
<https://www.mekanic.ca/en/homepage/>`_.
